bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Control Switchboards--Amendment 1: Control and Secondary Circuits and Devices, and All Wiring
IEEE Standard for Control Switchboards--Amendment 1: Control and Secondary Circuits and Devices, and All Wiring
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.21a-2020 (Amendment to IEEE Std C37.21-2017)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Requirements for control, secondary, and logic-level wiring are addressed in this amendment. It covers wire type, ampacity, and methods for protecting wiring across a hinge.
Requirements for control, secondary, and logic-level wiring are addressed in this amendment. It covers wire type, ampacity, and methods for protecting wiring across a hinge.
